summary.span: O namespace contém classes que representam os artefatos do WS-Trust.

span.span: The namespace contains classes that represent WS-Trust artifacts.

summary.span: Isso inclui as classes (RST) e (RSTR) e vários serializadores que podem serializar e desserializar entre os artefatos WS-Trust na conexão e sua representação no modelo de objeto.

span.span: These include the (RST) and (RSTR) classes and several serializers that can serialize and deserialize between WS-Trust artifacts on the wire and their representation in the object model.

summary.span: Por padrão, a WIF (Windows Identity Foundation) é compatível com as seguintes especificações WS-Trust: WS-Trust de fevereiro de 2005, WS-Trust 1.3 ou WS-Trust 1.4.

span.span: Out-of-the-box, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) contains support for the following WS-Trust specifications: WS-Trust February 2005, WS-Trust 1.3, or WS-Trust 1.4.
